Posted By: Turner Engle This is the only one ever graded by SGC. Card has a light crease that runs vertically through the right (not visible in scan). This is an absolute beautiful card. $650 shipped. [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img260.imageshack.us/img260/4875/scan0004cp5.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
